text: Lɨci 11.8 Ais 1.9-10, Lu 13.34, Ib 13.12, CHL 14.8, 18.10, 18.22-24 hulaŋ ahica agɨladɨ valɨ agɨlaŋ haiabɨla hekɨlɨ agadɨ hɨbɨ pɨlɨ heŋ hɨniavɨbali uami. Haiabɨla hekɨlɨ agasaŋ ala hɨve lama abavɨbali uami. Sodom haiabɨla aba abavɨbali uami. Isipɨ fɨli tɨbɨ aba abavɨbali uami. Haiabɨla hekɨlɨ heŋ ala vaka nulɨdɨ Hekɨlɨ dɨ avi vioua kɨlɨ cɨkaŋ hɨlihua lamalama agadɨ hɨvɨ lama henaŋ hɨvɨ ifavɨci uci hɨmami uami.
